00040                 template <typename T> 
00041                 struct tmat4x3
00042                 {
00043                         enum ctor{null};
00044                         typedef T value_type;
00045                         typedef std::size_t size_type;
00046                         typedef tvec3<T> col_type;
00047                         typedef tvec4<T> row_type;
00048                         static size_type col_size();
00049                         static size_type row_size();
00050 
00051                         typedef tmat4x3<T> type;
00052                         typedef tmat3x4<T> transpose_type;
00053 
00054                 private:
00055                         // Data 
00056                         col_type value[4];
00057 
00058                 public:
00059                         // Constructors
00060                         tmat4x3();
00061                         tmat4x3(tmat4x3 const & m);
00062 
00063                         explicit tmat4x3(
00064                                 ctor Null);
00065                         explicit tmat4x3(
00066                                 value_type const & x);
00067                         explicit tmat4x3(
00068                                 value_type const & x0, value_type const & y0, value_type const & z0,
00069                                 value_type const & x1, value_type const & y1, value_type const & z1,
00070                                 value_type const & x2, value_type const & y2, value_type const & z2,
00071                                 value_type const & x3, value_type const & y3, value_type const & z3);
00072                         explicit tmat4x3(
00073                                 col_type const & v0, 
00074                                 col_type const & v1,
00075                                 col_type const & v2,
00076                                 col_type const & v3);
00077 
00078                         // Conversion
00079                         template <typename U> 
00080                         explicit tmat4x3(tmat4x3<U> const & m);
00081                         
00082                         explicit tmat4x3(tmat2x2<T> const & x);
00083                         explicit tmat4x3(tmat3x3<T> const & x);

00090

00092                         col_type & operator[](size_type i);
00093                         col_type const & operator[](size_type i) const;

00096                         tmat4x3<T> & operator=  (tmat4x3<T> const & m);
00097                         template <typename U> 
00098                         tmat4x3<T> & operator=  (tmat4x3<U> const & m);

00100                         tmat4x3<T> & operator+= (U const & s);

00102                         tmat4x3<T> & operator+= (tmat4x3<U> const & m);
